data.name: The Climb 2
data.description: The thrill of climbing comes alive with The Climb 2 - explore a new city setting and exhilarating new maps with breathtaking views. Ascend grand peaks, navigate vast caves, climb skyscrapers, and discover hidden shortcuts as you find your path to the top. Compete with friends and conquer leaderboards in asynchronous multiplayer modes. From exploring mountain environments to scaling urban settings, feel the rush of climbing without ropes, and experience breathtaking vistas as you scale new heights.

translations.long_description: Vive la aventura de trepar con The Climb 2: explora una flamante ciudad e increíbles nuevos mapas con vistas alucinantes. Conquista cimas épicas, explora cuevas enormes, escala rascacielos y descubre atajos ocultos en tu camino a lo más alto. Compite con amigos y conquista los marcadores en los modos multijugador asincrónicos. Explora tanto montañas como ambientes urbanos, siente la emoción de escalar sin cuerdas y disfruta de vistas épicas desde las alturas.
translations.short_description: The Climb 2 te acerca la aventura de trepar en un nuevo entorno urbano, flamantes mapas fantásticos, novedosos eventos y mucho más. Conquista cimas épicas, explora cuevas enormes, escala rascacielos y descubre atajos en tu camino a lo más alto. Compite con amigos en el modo multijugador y conquista los marcadores.

translations.long_description: Mit The Climb 2 wird der Nervenkitzel des Kletterns zum Leben erweckt – erkunde das neue Stadt-Setting und die aufregenden neuen Karten mit fantastischen Aussichten. Erklimme epische Gipfel, navigiere durch riesige Höhlen, klettere an Wolkenkratzern hoch und entdecke auf dem Weg nach oben geheime Abkürzungen. Miss dich im asynchronen Mehrspieler-Modus mit Freunden und erobere die Bestenlisten. Von der Erkundung von Gebirgslandschaften bis hin zu städtischen Umgebungen – erlebe den Rausch des Kletterns ohne Seile und genieße atemberaubende Aussichten, während du immer höher klimmst.
translations.short_description: The Climb 2 erweckt den Nervenkitzel des Kletterns mit einem neuen Stadt-Setting, aufregenden neuen Karten, neuen Events und mehr zum Leben. Erklimme epische Gipfel, navigiere durch riesige Höhlen, klettere an Wolkenkratzern hoch und entdecke auf dem Weg nach oben hilfreiche Abkürzungen. Miss dich im Mehrspieler-Modus mit Freunden und erobere die Bestenlisten.

translations.long_description: The Climb 2で臨場感とスリル満点のクライミングに挑戦。新たな舞台となる都市や、息を呑む絶景の刺激的な新マップを探索しましょう。雄大な山の頂上を目指したり、広大な洞窟を探索したり、摩天楼をよじ登ったりしながら、ゴールに到達する近道を探しましょう。非同期マルチプレイモードでフレンドと競争し、ランキング制覇を目指すこともできます。山岳地帯を探索したり都会のビルをよじ登ったり、ロープなしのクライミングの高揚感を味わい、新たな高みに到達して息を呑む景色を堪能してください。
translations.short_description: The Climb 2は臨場感とスリル満点のクライミングゲームです。新たな舞台となる都市、エキサイティングな新マップ、新作イベントなどが盛りだくさん。伝説の山の頂上を目指したり、広大な洞窟を探索したり、摩天楼をよじ登ったりしながら、ゴールに到達する近道を探しましょう。マルチプレイでフレンドと競争し、ランキング制覇を目指してください。

translations.long_description: 새로운 도시 배경, 흥미로운 신규 맵, 신규 이벤트 등으로 가득한 The Climb 2는 클라이밍의 짜릿함을 그대로 선사합니다. 산 정상까지 등반하고, 드넓은 동굴을 탐험하고, 고층 건물을 오르고, 숨겨진 지름길을 발견해 꼭대기에 도달하세요. 비동기식 멀티플레이 모드로 친구와 경쟁해 리더보드의 우위를 점하세요. 산속을 탐험하고 도시의 빌딩을 오르며 로프 없이 클라이밍하는 짜릿함을 느끼고, 새로운 고지에 도달해 숨 멎을 듯한 풍광을 감상하세요.
translations.short_description: The Climb 2는 새로운 도시 배경, 흥미로운 신규 맵, 신규 이벤트 등으로 스릴을 선물합니다. 산 정상까지 등반하고, 드넓은 동굴을 탐험하고, 고층 건물을 오르고, 지름길을 발견해 꼭대기에 도달하세요. 멀티플레이 모드에서 리더보드의 상위권을 놓고 친구와 우위를 다투세요.

translations.long_description: Avec The Climb 2, les sensations de l'escalade sont plus intenses que jamais. Explorez un nouvel environnement urbain et des maps inédites offrant des vues à couper le souffle. Ascensionnez des pics grandioses, aventurez-vous au cœur de grottes gigantesques, escaladez des gratte-ciel vertigineux et découvrez des raccourcis savamment dissimulés qui vous mèneront tout droit au firmament ! Affrontez des amis et hissez-vous au top des classements en mode multijoueur asynchrone ! Du relief escarpé des régions montagneuses aux paysages résolument citadins, ressentez les poussées d'adrénaline que procure l'escalade sans corde et laissez-vous griser par des horizons extraordinaires lorsque vous atteindrez de nouveaux sommets.
translations.short_description: Avec The Climb 2, les sensations de l'escalade sont plus intenses que jamais. Au programme : un nouvel environnement urbain, des maps inédites, des événements exclusifs et bien plus encore ! Ascensionnez des pics extraordinaires, aventurez-vous au cœur de grottes gigantesques, escaladez des gratte-ciel vertigineux et découvrez des raccourcis qui vous mèneront tout droit au sommet ! Affrontez des amis en multijoueur et hissez-vous au top des classements !

changelog.change_log:
Hello Climbers.

We are releasing Update 2.2 today. In addition to general bug fixes this update introduces a new option allowing you to disable automatic body orientation. Now you can rotate your body freely as you leap from one grip to another around one corner to another. You can set this option in the game's menu.

We are aware that scrolling through the social leaderboard might load in random entries.
 
Stay healthy, and have fun scaling new heights!

Hello Climbers, 

Some of you have been experiencing an issue which prevents the game connecting to the backend. We’re releasing a tentative hotfix today. As we’ve only had a few complaints about this, we need your help to let us know if this solves the issue from you.

We know some of you have not been able to participate in the first monthly challenge, and we are sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. We are investigating how to address this as a next step once the fix has been confirmed to work.

Known issue: It might be that the leaderboards show you’re not connected after a Ghost Race but the "mini profile" in the middle says you are.

Stay healthy, and have fun scaling new heights!

Hello Climbers.

We are releasing Update 2.0 which introduces 12 monthly seasonal themed challenges today!

The monthly challenges (one at a time) will be active at given dates, and will be running for a period of 7 days in total. Within this period of time unique themed collectables will spawn in all regular levels, and all you have to do is to collect the set amount to unlock a wristband of the running challenge.

The first challenge “Harvest” will be live from August 10th to 17th 2021. Challenges will be announced 3 days before they begin in-game (and also will be announced via our social media channels too!) - so no worries you’ll be given ample time to prepare! They’ll reoccur annually too to give you the opportunity to collect’em all if you should miss out one!

In addition to general bug fixing Update 2.0 also gives you control of how you want to jump in-game: Currently, A-Button and push off can be used at the same time to jump. With Update 2.0 both methods can be selected separately, meaning either only A-Button or only push off. Or, as usual, both at the same time. All of this can be set in the options in-game.

Stay healthy, and have fun scaling new heights!

Hello Climbers.
 
We are happy to announce the roll out of Freestyle Expansion Pack Part 2. This update introduces the next 6 levels (Press Me!, Wheel'n'Jump, Obstacle Course, Rotating Blocks, Slides, and Crumbling Madness). Once you complete them step by step you will receive a new glove as completion reward.
 
The Freestyle Expansion Pack leverages the visual language of the Tutorial, and will challenge you in both "casual" and "professional" modes. The levels of Freestyle Expansion Pack have no checkpoints - and completing them without chalk will get you bonus points.

Last but not least we want to also inform you the average speed and efficiency leaderboards have been removed as part of this update. No worries this wouldn't affect your data in any way.

Stay healthy, and have fun scaling new heights!

Hello Climbers.

We are excited to release the first half of the Freestyle Expansion Pack today!

The Freestyle Expansion Pack is based upon the visual language of the Tutorial, and will challenge you in both "casual" and "professional" modes. Compared to the regular levels the ones in the Freestyle Expansion Pack have no checkpoints - and completing them without chalk will get you bonus points. We’re also introducing rhythm-based climbing where you’ll see disappearing grips along your route, requiring you to learn the grip patterns to the beat of a background track to progress through. You will unlock each of the 6 levels step by step, and once all are completed you will receive a new glove as a completion reward.

Last but not least this update includes general bug fixes as well. We will be monitoring closely what is said, and we will make it to a point to address issues you might encounter as soon as possible.

Major known issues of this update:
#1 Game might shut down and restart when returning from Oculus menu (this is a OS related issue!)
#2 UI breaks when starting a Ghost Race without having a connection to server

We hope you now have a smoother climbing experience.

Stay healthy, and have fun scaling new heights!

Hello Climbers.

Today we are releasing a hotfix to address the black screen issue that some of you have experienced and reported since hotfix #1. The issue in request seems to be based on multiple factors and is not entirely reproducible for us. We are therefore rolling out a tentative fix.

We rely on your feedback, and would appreciate if you could confirm that the black screen issue is now fixed for you. We sincerely hope that you continue having a smoother climbing experience. 

Stay healthy, and have fun scaling new heights!

Hello Climbers.
 
Here is a hotfix to address some issues that some of you have been experiencing with the current LIVE build:
 
- Fixed an issue causing leaderboard entries to stall which made the game feel laggy / cause occassional crash. Disclaimer: We are currently investigating on the stalls that might still potentially cause after returning to the menu or opening the leaderboard. We'll have a fix for you soon. 
 
- We've removed the option to disable body orientation as this feature has caused some players to not be able to pull themselves up at checkpoints. We will re-introduce this option at a later date again.
 
- The issue with the placeholder strings has now been resolved. Disclaimer: If you still see placeholder strings when you launch the game please select any of the supported languages in-game and this will resolve the issue!
 
Last but not least we are aware that some of you experience flickering and a few occasional crashes. We are monitoring closely what is said, and we will make it to a point to include those fixes with upcoming updates.
 
We hope you now have a smoother climbing experience!
 
Stay healthy, and have fun scaling new heights!
